headerDisplay: For requirements to run this plugin including additional hardware and software, see [homebridge-amazondash-mac#readme](https://github.com/shanemcw/homebridge-amazondash-mac#readme).

name.description: The name to appear in HomeKit.

serial.title: Serial Number
serial.description: Blank, or two or more characters with no spaces.

model.title: Model
model.description: The model number is printed on the back of the Dash button.

alias.title: Aliases
alias.description: An alias allows multiple buttons to act as one. If no aliases are needed, remove these elements.

items.title: Alias
items.description: MAC address of another button to act as this button.

doublePress.title: Enable Double Press
doublePress.description: Register a second press soon after the LEDs go dark as a double press.

interface.title: Interface
interface.description: Try iwconfig, tcpdump -D or similar to get your wifi device interface name.

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: If and after you choose "Clear Accessories," restart homebridge, then change this value to "Testing Messages" and restart homebridge again.

wport.title: Web API Port
wport.description: Specify a port to enable virtual button pushes remotely via a web API.

wtoken.title: Web API Token
wtoken.description: If desired, require this token to be provided for virtual button push execution.

airInstead.title: Use airodump-ng instead of tcpdump
airInstead.description: tcpdump may not be usable in some environments where airodump-ng is a working option.

buttons.title: Dash Buttons
buttons.description: Add more with "Add Button" below. See the readme linked above for more information about finding these values.
